sentences.en: (= very quickly ) she replied, ‘That’s not what I’ve heard!’
sentences.cn: 她随即答道:“我听到的不是那样！”

sentences.en: Although this recipe looks long, it is actually very quick to prepare.
sentences.cn: 尽管这个菜谱看上去很长，其实做起来很快。

sentences.en: Come quick! Larry’s on TV!
sentences.cn: 快来！ 拉里上电视了！

sentences.en: Come quick! Larry’s on TV! ＃
sentences.cn: 快来！ 拉里上电视了！

sentences.en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

sentences.en: Have we got time for a quick drink?
sentences.cn: 我们有时间喝口东西吗？

sentences.en: He downed his opponent with a quick right to the jaw.
sentences.cn: 他迅速准确击中对手的下颌而把他击倒。

sentences.en: He is very sharp, a quick thinker and swift with repartee.
sentences.cn: 他非常机敏，反应很快，并且能说会道。

sentences.en: He took one last quick look about the room.
sentences.cn: 他朝房间匆匆扫了最后一眼。

sentences.en: He was asked about earlier boasts of a quick victory.
sentences.cn: 有人质问他早先说过的那些速战速决的大话.

sentences.en: Her nails were bitten to the quick.
sentences.cn: 她的指甲都咬到肉里了。

sentences.en: His friends say he was always quick to tell a joke.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友们说，以前他讲笑话总是张嘴就来。

sentences.en: I just had a quick scan through your book again.
sentences.cn: 我只是又快速浏览了一遍你的书。

sentences.en: I looked at what he'd given me and did a quick subtraction.
sentences.cn: 我看着他给我的东西，快速做了个减法。

sentences.en: It all happened pretty quick.
sentences.cn: 事情发生得非常快。

sentences.en: It’s probably quicker by train.
sentences.cn: 乘火车可能会快一点。

sentences.en: She gave him a quick, upward look, then lowered her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她抬眼迅速瞥了他一下，然后眼睛又垂了下去。

sentences.en: She walked with short, quick steps.
sentences.cn: 她迈着小碎步疾行。

sentences.en: Sugar gives quick relief to hunger but provides no lasting nourishment.
sentences.cn: 糖能快速缓解饥饿感，但不能提供持久的营养。

sentences.en: That was quick! I thought you’d be another hour.
sentences.cn: 很快啊！我以为你还要一个小时呢。

sentences.en: The critics were too quick to give their verdict on us.
sentences.cn: 评论家们给我们下定论未免太操之过急了。

sentences.en: The process of replication is very quick and efficient.
sentences.cn: 复制的过程快捷、高效。

sentences.en: They went for a quick snog behind the bike sheds.
sentences.cn: 他们去了自行车棚的后面，短暂地拥吻了一下。

sentences.en: This delicious variation on an omelette is quick and easy to prepare.
sentences.cn: 这种稍加变化的可口煎蛋卷做起来又快又容易。

sentences.en: Three bombs went off in quick succession (= quickly, one after the other ).
sentences.cn: 瞬间有三个炸弹连续爆炸。

sentences.en: We stopped to have a quick look at the church.
sentences.cn: 我们停下来迅速地扫了一眼教堂。

sentences.en: Wendy popped in for a quick bite to eat on Monday night.
sentences.cn: 温迪周一晚上过来匆匆吃了点儿饭。

sentences.en: What’s the quickest way to the station?
sentences.cn: 到车站怎么走最快？

words.tran_cn: 加快；变活跃；进入胎动期

phrases.tran_cn: （用伤人的话或行为）深深伤害，刺痛
快速恢复；快速回收；快速列支；迅速复原

trans.tran_cn: 快的，急速的，聪明的，凌厉的，灵活的，短时间做成的
trans.tran_en: lasting for or taking only a short time
quickly – many teachers think this is not correct English

trans.tran_cn: （指甲下的）活肉，感情的中枢，感觉最敏锐的地方，要害，核心
